twcore.bots.twbot
Class SpecTask

java.lang.Object
  twcore.bots.twbot.SpecTask

public class SpecTask
extends java.lang.Object

SpecTask class for use with twbotspec2, it has to be a public class in order for the reflection in ItemCommand to work. Represents an individual rule for eliminating a player or group of players after a certain number of deaths.

Version:
06.07.08
Author:
D1st0rt

isApplicable

public int isApplicable(int f,
                        int s,
                        int pID)
Determines whether this task applies to a provided player.

Parameters:
f - the player's frequency
s - the player's ship type
pID - the player's player ID
Returns:
the priority at which this task applies (larger number indicates a higher priority)
